thread.title: Majora’s Mask coming as huge, life-size replica
thread.title_full: Majora’s Mask coming as huge, life-size replica

author: Michael McWhertor
title: Majora’s Mask coming as huge, life-size replica
text: First 4 Figures’ Majora’s Mask replica First 4 Figures Collectibles maker First 4 Figures will release a life-size replica of Majora’s Mask — from Nintendo 64 game The Legend of Zelda : Majora’s Mask , naturally — later this year, the company announced this week. The Majora’s Mask replica stands 25 inches tall and rests upon a replica tree stump. First 4 Figures notes that the mask isn’t meant to be worn, and with a $354.99 starting price, it’s hard to imagine many Zelda fans will want to risk customizing the replica to make it wearable. But it does make a nice display piece. First 4 Figures will release its Majora’s Mask replica in two forms: a regular edition and a limited, exclusive edition that features LEDs that light up the mask’s eyes. The exclusive edition, which will be available for pre-order only through Jan. 24, costs $384.99. The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask replica will be released in Q3 2017. For a more detailed look, check out our gallery and a making of video below.
